org.dador

Class HexConverters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dador.HexConverters

  • public class HexConverters
extends java.lang.Object
    Collection of tools to manipulate String represented as Hex characters Created by Damien Salvador on 18/10/2016.

    • Method Summary

      • xorArray

        public static byte[] xorArray(byte[] buf1,
                              byte[] buf2)
                       throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Applies xor element by element. buf1 and buf2 must be same length !
        Parameters:
        buf1 - : first element for xor
        buf2 - : second element for xor
        Returns:
        byte array containing xored values of buf1 and buf2
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
